_header: Jesu Christ heaven king / All us grant good ending
_description: Arthour and Merlin — 9938 lines in couplets

BodDou124.First Lines:
Thus ended sir fortigerThat misbileued a fewe
                    ȝer…
BodDou124.Last Lines:
…þai maden gret blis and festAnd after ȝeden hem to
                    rest
BodDou124.Note: Begins imperfectly. Transcript of Edinburgh,  National Library of Scotland, Advocates’ 19.2.1 [Auchinleck MS].

NLS1921.First Lines: Ihesu crist heuen kingAl ous graunt gode ending…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Þai maden gret blis & fest& after ȝeden hem
                    to rest
NLS1921.Note: 9772 lines in couplets; transcript c. 1800 in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Douce 124 (SC 21698), ff. 1-41 (lines 1909-9772).
